subject: Re: Update information with DNS provider

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed
Joel Maligalig assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Jenni,

We can't seem to find the plugin link. We have updated the add plugin capability and you will now be able to add plugins.

Awesome! Thanks so much.

Now my other question. Can you add a calendar plugin like MyCalendar to our website for me please. I don't think I have access to add plugins.

Cheers

Jen

Hi Jenni,

Thanks for adding Heath, Custom email Sending Domain is now verified. Please see the attached.

Hi Joel,

I've added Heath.

The area you are looking for is under Settings/Email Sending Domain

Cheers

Jen

Hi Jenni,

Sure, that would be great, can you please add heath@wolfiq.com.au instead.

Hi Joel,

This is the notification from Raisley.



And then when you click on Try Again you get this pop up.



I'm just checking with our systems support about the other email you sent through.

If it's easier do you want me to give you access to the Raisley back end? Sorry, I had hoped this would be a five minute job.

Cheers

Jenni

Hi Jenni,

Can you please copy and paste the value that they have provided here. You can click on the 'paper icon' to copy it.
Can you please copy and paste the value that they have provided here. You can click on the 'paper icon' to copy it.

Hi Jenni,

We are looking into the DNS settings. Please see the below:

Would you verify the below and if we could remove some of the includes?
TXT: v=spf1 +a +mx +ip4:35.189.58.105 +include:spf.hostedmail.net.au include:spf.protection.outlook.com include:spf.memnet.com.au include:raiselysite.com ~all

Hi Joel,
The Raisley site has now given me this:



Hopefully that might help correct the issue.

Thanks

Jenni

Hi Joel,

There was an issue with the verification for this line:

TXT transplant.org.au v=spf1 include:raiselysite.com ~all

Can you check that one for me?

Also, can I ask, if I wanted to add a calendar plugin to our site www.transplant.org.au like My Calendar, does that have to go through you?

Thanks

Jenni

Just verifying now. They said it may take upto 24 hrs. Will let you know when it's complete.

Thanks so much.

Jenni

Hi Jenni,

Confirming we have updated the DNS, Can you check on your end?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Guys,
I need to update some information on our DNS records for transplant.org.au so that our new Raisley fundraising site will send emails from our domain as a default. Are you able to supply me with the log in information or else are you able to do the update for me?

It is simply adding the following records:
  • TXT - mx._domainkey.transplant.org.au - k=rsa; p=MIGfMA0GCSqGSIb3DQEBAQUAA4GNADCBiQKBgQCpcOvXlDNQiAIJzNCJLS/34ghVh0Y44NKiCZcJcF6pjwxJCBZB2W5TwxSF4wNB26SHQIgYQmQNeXWkpyDqLGD+jUAvQ2AZzIlWeBQ0ncxDDT+1Xp288e2JM8pIVinYSeQGDMUZq2EK0xIF+BsOMpIc0GRJYH2zlEIzrrWo6ScZQQIDAQAB
  • TXT - transplant.org.au - v=spf1 include:raiselysite.com ~all
  • CNAME - email.transplant.org.au - mailgun.org

Thanks


Jenni Vilé
Marketing & Communications Coordinator


Please note my work days are Monday - Thursday


Transplant Australia acknowledges the traditional owners of the Country throughout Australia.
We pay our respects to Elders past and present
